LanguageData.VV_NHCP_CedarPlankFloor.label: cedar laminate floor
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_EbonyPlankFloor.label: ebony laminate floor
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_MahoganyPlankFloor.label: mahogany laminate floor

LanguageData.VV_NHCP_VFEArch_WoodenParquetCedar.label: cedar laminate wooden parquet
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_VFEArch_WoodenParquetCedar.descr: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_VFEArch_WoodenParquetEbony.label: ebony laminate wooden parquet
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_VFEArch_WoodenParquetEbony.descr: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.

LanguageData.VV_NHCP_VFEArch_WoodenParquetRosewood.de: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.
